description: Returns the list of data connections of the given Kusto database.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group containing the Kusto cluster.

cluster_name.description: The name of the Kusto cluster.

database_name.description: The name of the database in the Kusto cluster.

subscription_id.description: The ID of the target subscription.

api_version.description: The API version to use for this operation.
